enb_long_title: Twelfth Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Working Group III (WGIII-12) and Thirty-ninth Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-39)
sentences: This session was held from 14-17 October 2013 in Batumi, Georgia.

At the meeting, the Panel considered and adopted two methodology reports: '2013 Supplement to the 2006 IPCC Guidelines for National Greenhouse Gas Inventories: Wetlands' and '2013 Revised Supplementary Methods and Good Practice Guidance Arising from the Kyoto Protocol'.
The IPCC also addressed a range of procedural matters and undertook initial discussions on mapping the future of the IPCC.
